verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH1961> on the day <WH3117> that Moses <WH4872> had fully <WH3615> set up <WH6965> <WH853> the tabernacle, <WH4908> and had anointed <WH4886> it, and sanctified <WH6942> it, and all <WH3605> the instruments <WH3627> thereof, both the altar <WH4196> and all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> thereof, and had anointed <WH4886> them, and sanctified <WH6942> them;

That the princes <WH5387> of Israel, <WH3478> heads <WH7218> of the house <WH1004> of their fathers, <WH1> who <WH1992> were the princes <WH5387> of the tribes, <WH4294> and were over <WH5975> them <WH1992> that were numbered, <WH5921> <WH6485> offered: <WH7126>

And they brought <WH935> <WH853> their offering <WH7133> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> six <WH8337> covered <WH6632> wagons, <WH5699> and twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> oxen; <WH1241> a wagon <WH5699> for <WH5921> two <WH8147> of the princes, <WH5387> and for each one <WH259> an ox: <WH7794> and they brought <WH7126> them before <WH6440> the tabernacle. <WH4908>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Take <WH3947> it of <WH4480> <WH854> them, that they may be <WH1961> to do <WH5647> <WH853> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation; <WH4150> and thou shalt give <WH5414> them unto <WH413> the Levites, <WH3881> to every man <WH376> according to <WH6310> his service. <WH5656>
And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH853> the wagons <WH5699> and the oxen, <WH1241> and gave <WH5414> them unto <WH413> the Levites. <WH3881>
<WH853> Two <WH8147> wagons <WH5699> and four <WH702> oxen <WH1241> he gave <WH5414> unto the sons <WH1121> of Gershon, <WH1648> according to <WH6310> their service: <WH5656>

And four <WH702> wagons <WH5699> and eight <WH8083> oxen <WH1241> he gave <WH5414> unto the sons <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> according unto <WH6310> their service, <WH5656> under the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>

But unto the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> he gave <WH5414> none: <WH3808> because <WH3588> the service <WH5656> of the sanctuary <WH6944> belonging unto <WH5921> them was that they should bear <WH5375> upon their shoulders. <WH3802>

And the princes <WH5387> offered <WH7126> <WH853> for dedicating <WH2598> of the altar <WH4196> in the day <WH3117> that it was anointed, <WH4886> even the princes <WH5387> offered <WH7126> <WH853> their offering <WH7133> before <WH6440> the altar. <WH4196>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> They shall offer <WH7126> <WH853> their offering, <WH7133> each <WH259> prince <WH5387> on his day, <WH3117> <WH259> <WH5387> <WH3117> for the dedicating <WH2598> of the altar. <WH4196>

And he that offered <WH7126> <WH853> his offering <WH7133> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> was <WH1961> Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab, <WH5992> of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah: <WH3063>

And his offering <WH7133> was one <WH259> silver <WH3701> charger, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> thereof was a hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> shekels, one <WH259> silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them were full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meat offering: <WH4503>
One <WH259> spoon <WH3709> of ten <WH6235> shekels of gold, <WH2091> full <WH4392> of incense: <WH7004>

One <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering: <WH2403>
